head.title: How to Shop for the Baby Without Leaving the Nursery

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Technology, Telecommunications and Internet

hedline.hl1: How to Shop for the Baby Without Leaving the Nursery

abstract.p: BabyBox.com, Brooklyn-based Web site, specializes in gifts for newborns to 12-month-old babies (S)

block.p: BabyBox.com opened its Web site, specializing in gifts for newborn to 12-month-old babies, on Dec. 7. Featuring 36 ''shopping aisles'' with baby items ranging from teether rattles ($8.95) to grand Alsatian bassinets ($615-720), BabyBox.com, based in Brooklyn, consolidates on one site (www.babybox.com) a selection of upscale goods that would normally require a trip to many boutiques.

Organized into six merchandise sections -- nursery, clothes, blankets, toys, bath and beach, and books and music -- the site also has pages for featured items, gifts categorized according to price and a baby clothes sizing chart. A customer profile option allows a customer to be reminded of previous purchases.

BabyBox.com opened its Web site, specializing in gifts for newborn to 12-month-old babies, on Dec. 7. Featuring 36 ''shopping aisles'' with baby items ranging from teether rattles ($8.95) to grand Alsatian bassinets ($615-720), BabyBox.com, based in Brooklyn, consolidates on one site (www.babybox.com) a selection of upscale goods that would normally require a trip to many boutiques.

Organized into six merchandise sections -- nursery, clothes, blankets, toys, bath and beach, and books and music -- the site also has pages for featured items, gifts categorized according to price and a baby clothes sizing chart. A customer profile option allows a customer to be reminded of previous purchases.

Katherine Type, a founding partner of BabyBox.com, mentioned some plans: to expand the line of personalized items like emroidered quilts ($120), hand-painted frames ($30-70) and handmade sweaters ($115), to develop a BabyBox.com signature clothing line and to establish a baby shower registry service.
